segment.target: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Overview Topics (Windows 10)

segment.source: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Overview Topics
segment.target: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Overview Topics

segment.source: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Overview Topics
segment.target: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Overview Topics

segment.source: The User State Migration Tool (USMT) 10.0 provides a highly customizable user-profile migration experience for IT professionals.
segment.target: The User State Migration Tool (USMT) 10.0 provides a highly customizable user-profile migration experience for IT professionals.

segment.source: USMT includes three command-line tools: ScanState.exe, LoadState.exe, and UsmtUtils.exe.
segment.target: USMT includes three command-line tools: ScanState.exe, LoadState.exe, and UsmtUtils.exe.

segment.source: USMT also includes a set of three modifiable .xml files: MigApp.xml, MigDocs.xml, and MigUser.xml.
segment.target: USMT also includes a set of three modifiable .xml files: MigApp.xml, MigDocs.xml, and MigUser.xml.

segment.source: Additionally, you can create custom .xml files to support your migration needs.
segment.target: Additionally, you can create custom .xml files to support your migration needs.

segment.source: You can also create a Config.xml file to specify files or settings to exclude from the migration.
segment.target: You can also create a Config.xml file to specify files or settings to exclude from the migration.

segment.target: Windows Upgrade and Migration Considerations

segment.source: Discusses the Microsoft® tools you can use to move files and settings between installations, as well as special considerations for performing an upgrade or migration.
segment.target: Discusses the Microsoft® tools you can use to move files and settings between installations, as well as special considerations for performing an upgrade or migration.
